original_text: The burden of the beasts of the south: into the land of trouble and anguish, from whence come the young and old lion, the viper and fiery flying serpent, they will carry their riches upon the shoulders of young asses, and their treasures upon the bunches of camels, to a people that shall not profit them.

sentences.original_text: The burden of the beasts of the south
into the land of trouble and anguish
from whence come the young and old lion
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 어린 사자와 늙은 사자가 나오며

sentences.original_text: the viper and fiery flying serpent
they will carry their riches upon the shoulders of young asses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 재물을 어린 나귀의 어깨에 싣고

sentences.original_text: and their treasures upon the bunches of camels
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 보물을 낙타의 무리 위에 싣겠으나

sentences.original_text: to a people that shall not profit them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 유익이 되지 않을 백성에게로 가리라
